divs: Sighting Details3 red orange lights were lined up on top of each other vertically then changed to triangle shape and continued rotating. We observed for about 5 mins from time of sighting to when they dissapeard. One dipped down from the group and shot off when plane was passing by and they other two lights dim out and dissapeard
Summary: 3 red orange lights lined up vertically then changed to triangle shape and continued rotating. We observed for about 5 mins from time of sighting to when they dissapeard. One dipped down from the group and shot off when plane
